comments.author: Simon Willnauer
comments.body:
Created a patch for the website. 
As mike mentioned in the chat it would be desirable to have an archive for the IRC channel. Does anybody know how IRC archiving works and who initially created the channel?

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body: Why does this talk about Hadoop?  Ie shouldn't it be Lucene?

comments.author: Simon Willnauer
comments.body: LOL - I should not do any copy paste -- will fix later

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body: Looks good, thanks Simon!  I'll commit shortly.

description: We should add a link to #lucene IRC channel on chat.freenode.org.
summary: Add link to irc channel #lucene on the website
